body: The winds lift you, carrying you where you want to go.
name: Wings of Air
url: pfsrd://Advanced Race Guide/Races/Sylphs/New Racial Rules/Sylph Feats/Wings of Air

sections.body: Your bonus on saves against effects with the air or electricity descriptors and effects that deal electricity damage increases to +4. In addition, you gain a supernatural fly speed equal to your base speed (good maneuverability). You may only fly with this ability when wearing light armor or no armor.
sections.name: Benefit
